document_data.name: Endless Ice Sea
document_data.mainbody: The '''Endless Ice Sea''' was an enormous glacier north of the [[Spine of the World]] believed to house hidden treasure troves and magic.
document_data.Geography:
The Endless Ice Sea was located to the east of [[Reghed Glacier]] and a frozen wasteland. To the south it was lined by the Spine of the World. The western edge of the glacier approximately lined up with [[Lurkwood]] and the [[Valley of Khedrun]] to the south. To the north of it was the [[Ice Spires]].

[[Fairy ice]] was known to naturally occur in this area.
document_data.History:
The Endless Ice Sea rose alongside the [[Great Glacier]] from [[Ulutiu]]'s magic necklace.

During the [[War of the Hart|War of Heart]], [[Hartkiller]] was known to have sought allies among the various humans scattered throughout the Endless Ice Sea.
document_data.Inhabitants: Around [[1366 DR]],{{Giantcraft date}} a number of ancient [[giant]] tribes dating back to the days of [[Ostoria]] were known to be maintaining strongholds scattered throughout the area.
